price: 10. Realmente, tememos de parte de nuestro Señor un día terrible que hará mudar de semblante”.
arabic: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوۡمًا عَبُوسٗا قَمۡطَرِيرٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: innā nakhāfu min rabbinā yawman ʿabūsan qamṭarīran
